title: 2B On 25TH Floor View of Financial District from Balcony!
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1198 Sq.
Of the classic and the eclectic.
This 400-foot high-rise apartment building crowns San Francisco’s fabled The East Cut and stands as an iconic addition to the city skyline.
It is a statement about elegance in a place where elegance actually means something.

Hansgrohe faucets, Apartments with balconies and terraces*, Bertazzoni speed oven*, Light ash-finished hardwood floor, Dual-zone air conditioning and heating, Slow-close cabinets and drawers, Roller shades, Stainless steel Bosch cooking suite and built-in dishwasher, Keyless entry for residence doors, Room of all trades*, Full-size vented washer and dryer, Pre-wired for telephone, data and TV, Stainless steel Fisher & Paykel refrigerator*, Soaking tub*, Window seats*, Caesarstone countertops, Gas stovetop, Expansive vistas from floor-to-ceiling windows, Fiber-optic cable provides fastest Internet connection in the San Francisco Bay Area, Garbage disposal

Curated art collection, Digital antenna for optimized cell coverage, Internet at warp speed—the fastest in San Francisco, Club lounge with interactive video wall, Indoor/outdoor pool, hot tub and saunas, Designed according to LEED® Silver certification from the US Green Building Council, On-site movie theater, Resident service coordinator, In-unit package delivery, Resident storage, App-based resident management, On-demand car wash and detailing, Dog wash and grooming station, Gym / fitness center, Pet friendly apartments, WiFi throughout common areas, Bike repair room and storage, Destination-entry elevators, Laundry and dry cleaning services, Valet for residents and guests, Interactive touchscreen technology for valet, deliveries and navigating building information, powered by Riseio, Intelligent mobile technology that preemptively alerts Concierge upon entry and exit, Car charging stations, Food delivery storage for perishables and dry goods, Business center with printing, copying, and scanning, 24/7 concierge, Bike share, Boardrooms with video conferencing and conference tables

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
